content: Enjoy free concerts, a public beach, and a playground just steps from your room. Shepard Park is the heart of Lake George Village events.
The largest and most famous beach on Lake George. We offer the perfect home base for families looking for a day on the sand.
A quieter alternative to the village beaches, Usher Park features a small beach, playground, and picnic areas.
Hike or drive to the summit for a 100-mile view. We are one of the closest lodging options to the trailhead.
Explore French and Indian War history and enjoy a quiet picnic in this historic state park.
A popular hike with rewarding views. Start your morning with our continental breakfast before hitting the trail.
Step back in time at this historic fort. Perfect for history buffs staying at The Heritage.
A classic village attraction for those who love a good scare, just around the corner.
One of the oldest and most charming mini-golf courses in the country.
Take a cruise on the Minne-Ha-Ha or the Lac du Saint Sacrement. We are a short stroll from the docks.
Plan a day of thrills at the theme park while staying in the more relaxing environment of the village.
Cool off at the water park and return to our heated pool for a quiet evening.
Sample local wines at their village tasting room, located just down Canada Street.
Shop all your favorite brands at the Factory Outlets of Lake George.
A local favorite for steak and seafood in an authentic log cabin setting.
Traditional Italian dining practically next door to The Heritage.
Dine on the water with views of the lake and the steamboats.
The center of the world's largest multi-brand motorcycle touring rally every June.
A massive gathering of classic cars right in the heart of the village.
Explore the charming neighboring town for more shopping and lakeside dining.
Visit the Hyde Collection art museum or catch a game at the Cool Insuring Arena.
The perfect home base for a day at the races without the Saratoga price tag.
Stay in the Beach Road area and enjoy the best of Lake George Village. Our property is the premier choice for Beach Road visitors.
Stay in the Canada Street Central area and enjoy the best of Lake George Village. Our property is the premier choice for Canada Street Central visitors.
Stay in the West Brook Road area and enjoy the best of Lake George Village. Our property is the premier choice for West Brook Road visitors.
Stay in the Diamond Point area and enjoy the best of Lake George Village. Our property is the premier choice for Diamond Point visitors.
Stay in the Placid Street area and enjoy the best of Lake George Village. Our property is the premier choice for Placid Street visitors.
The Heritage is the top-rated destination for Family Reunions in Lake George. We offer specialized amenities to ensure your group has a perfect stay.
The Heritage is the top-rated destination for Honeymoons in Lake George. We offer specialized amenities to ensure your group has a perfect stay.
The Heritage is the top-rated destination for Motorcycle Touring in Lake George. We offer specialized amenities to ensure your group has a perfect stay.
The Heritage is the top-rated destination for Fishing Trips in Lake George. We offer specialized amenities to ensure your group has a perfect stay.
The Heritage is the top-rated destination for Corporate Retreats in Lake George. We offer specialized amenities to ensure your group has a perfect stay.
The Heritage is the top-rated destination for Wedding Guest Lodging in Lake George. We offer specialized amenities to ensure your group has a perfect stay.
